LuaCommand(string, string, LuaFunction, string[], string, string)

Represents a lua command that can be executed by the player.

public LuaCommand(string name, string description, LuaFunction executeFunction, string[] aliases, string usage, string category)

Parameters

name string

The name of the command.

description string

A brief description of the command.

executeFunction LuaFunction

The function to execute when the command is run.

aliases string[]

A list of aliases for the command.

usage string

A brief description of how to use the command.

category string

The category of the command.
